Package com.peyrona.mingle.controllers

Class ControllerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.controllers.ControllerBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.IController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellSet, Control, DataBase, Excel, File, HttpClient, Kronos, LednetWifi5Ch, LightCtrlBase, ModbusTcpClientWrapper, MqttClientWrapper, OutputStream, RPiGpioPin, Sensors, SocketClient, SunFreeTTS, SystemClock, SystemMonitor, Telegram, WeatherOpenMeteo
    public abstract class ControllerBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.IController
    This is the base class for controllers written in Java language.

    Controllers are known only by Drivers, therefore there is no need to check here that a Controller instance is in charge of the received deviceName because this is done at Driver level.

    Note: even if Controllers are not singletons, at ExEn there is only one instance per Driver class and Drivers has only one instance of their Controllers and a Controller class can be used only by one class Driver. Therefore, there will be only one instance of Controller per each class of Controller.

    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle
